metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for security operations, configuration management, and developer productivity

plugins.name: super-manager
plugins.description: Unified manager for all Claude Code configuration - hooks, skills, MCP servers, and instructions.

plugins.name: v1-api
plugins.description: Trend Micro Vision One API wrapper with 280+ operations. Query alerts, endpoints, threats, cloud security, and more.

plugins.name: diff-view
plugins.description: Side-by-side diff viewer with editable right side, resizable panels, synced heights, and merge workflow.

plugins.name: hook-manager
plugins.description: Create and manage Claude Code hooks - correct schema, all event formats, stdin/stdout contracts, enable/disable/verify. Complete hook knowledge base.

plugins.name: skill-manager
plugins.description: Self-installing skill manager with keyword enrichment, hook health checks, and session-start auto-maintenance.

plugins.name: credential-manager
plugins.description: Store and retrieve API tokens/secrets in OS credential store (Windows Credential Manager / macOS Keychain). GUI popup for zero-friction secure storage.

plugins.name: trend-docs
plugins.description: Read Trend Micro documentation from JS SPA pages using Playwright. Auto-installs dependencies.

plugins.name: mcp-manager
plugins.description: Manage MCP servers - list, enable, disable, start, stop, reload. Configuration and lifecycle management.

plugins.name: instruction-manager
plugins.description: Manage context-aware instruction files with keyword matching. Conditional context injection for Claude Code sessions.

plugins.name: trend-docs-mcp
plugins.description: MCP server for searching and reading Trend Micro documentation. DuckDuckGo search + async Playwright extraction for JS SPA pages.

plugins.name: claude-code-chat-export
plugins.description: Export Claude Code conversations to styled HTML with search, landing page, and raw text export
